name: IrvineSpectrum
0:
”Alexa, ask Irvine Spectrum where are the restrooms”
”Alexa, start Irvine Spectrum”
”Alexa, ask Irvine Spectrum, tell me about the giant wheel”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: irvine spectrum
Developer Terms of Use
des: Introducing Irvine Spectrum Center's Alexa Skill: At Your Service. If you're in search of a store, a service or a bite to eat, you can now find it instantly. Try it! Simply ask questions like, "Where is Nordstrom located?" or "Where I can valet?" or "Where are the restrooms?" and our IBM Watson-enhanced guest services experience will help you shop and navigate Irvine Spectrum Center instantly. Go ahead and try it out. We're always here and At Your Service.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
